item.description:
Longstanding raw pioneer and chef Rawbert of Organic Garden Cafe gives a FREE Lecture Saturday from 2 to 3pm on the Basics and Benefits of Raw Food Nutrition & Lifestyle. Along with the talk Rawbert will also demonstrateseveral awesome recipes and provide samples!Â  Chianti is located just across the street from the Organic Garden Cafe so you may come over the cafe before or after with some fellow 'classmates', to continue your exciting inspiring day.

Learn some of the very basics to understanding pH and the importance of hydrating and alkaline forming foods plus more.

WARNING: This talk could save your life ;)
item.name: FREE: Raw Food Nutrition Talk & Food Demos with Rawbert
